column2: "Nna Solomon hyɛɛ ase dɛ orisi EWURADZE ne fi no wɔ Jerusalɛm bepɔw Moria do
column3: mbrɛ EWURADZE yii noho kyerɛɛ n'egya David no

column2: "Na n'ahendzi no n'afe a otsia anan no mu bosoom a otsia ebien no mu da a otsia ebien no
"Afei fapem a Solomon hyɛe dze maa Nyankopɔn ne fi ne nsii no nye yi. Ne tsentsen basafa mu dɛ mbrɛ nkan no nsusui tse no
"Na abrandaa a ɔwɔ dan no enyim no ne tsentsen
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ɔdan no ne tɛtɛr tse
column5: na no krɔn eduosia: na ɔdze sika mapa duraa no mu afamu."

column2: "Na dan kɛse no ɔdze ɔpepeaa ndua saam do
column3: na ɔdze sika pa duraa ho

column2: "Na ɔdze abo a ɔsom bo kataa ɔdan no ho wɔ ne fɛw ntsi: na sika no yɛ Parvaim sika."

column6: na no mbobow no ho; na oyiyii wɔ afasu no ho."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ krɔnkrɔn mu krɔnkrɔn dan no; ne tsentsen
column3: dɛ mbrɛ dan no ne tɛtɛr no tse
column5: na ne tɛtɛr basafa du; na ɔdze sika pa a n'ano tow  talent   ahaesia duraa ho."

column2: "Na ne mprɛgow ne nkerii no n'ano tow sika dwetɛbona eduonum. Na ɔdze sika duraduraa ɔsor mpia no ho."
"Na ɔyɛɛ kerubfo ebien osian edwuma wɔ krɔnkrɔn mu krɔnkrɔn dan no mu; na wɔdze sika duraa ho."
"Na kerubfo no hɔn ntsaban ne tsentsen yɛ basafa du: kerub baako n'atsaban kor basafa ebien na fa
column3: ɔka dan no ne fasu no; na atsaban kor no so yɛ basafa ebien na fa
column4: ɔka kerub baako no so n'atsaban."

column2: "Na kerub baako no so n'atsaban kor yɛ basafa ebien na fa
column3: ɔka ɔdan no ne fasu no; na n'atsaban kor no so yɛ basafa ebien na fa
column4: ɔka kerub baako no so n'atsaban no."

column2: "Kerubfo yi hɔn ntsaban mu tsɛw basafa du: na wogyinagyina hɔn anan do
column3: na hɔn enyim dzi dan no no do afamu."

column5: na ndwera pa dze yɛɛ ntwamutam no

column2: "Eso dan no enyim edum ebien a n'atsentsen yɛ basafa duesuon na fa
column3: na ntaadotsir a ɔwɔ no mu kor etsifi ɔyɛ basafa ebien na fa."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ ntweaban wɔ mpiakyir no mu
column3: na ɔdze sensɛɛn edum no etsifi; na ɔyeyɛɛ  pɔmegranate  ekutu ɔha
column4: na ɔdze hyehyɛɛ ntweaban no mu."

column2: "Na ɔdze edum no sisii asɔrfi no enyim
column4: na kor so wɔ abankum afamu; na ɔfrɛɛ dza ɔwɔ enyimfa no ne dzin Jakin
column5: na dza ɔwɔ abankum no ne dzin Boaz."
